channel.title: 19 November 2016 — MakerCity at Timelab, Ghent, Belgium
channel.description:
I'll be showing my auto://loop performance synth at Timelab during MakerCity this weekend. More info about the event on the Timelab website: http://timelab.org/open-weekend
And this is the synth: http://community.axoloti.com/t/auto-loop-performer-synth/2226

item.title: 19 November 2016 — MakerCity at Timelab, Ghent, Belgium
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

I'll be showing my auto://loop performance synth at Timelab during MakerCity this weekend.
More info about the event on the Timelab website: http://timelab.org/open-weekend

And this is the synth:

Auto://loop Performer Synth Your Music/Projects
I’ve finished building a performance synthesizer based on the Axoloti Core board a while ago, and hadn’t found any time to document it yet. So here is what it looks like. A full overview of the build process with lots of photos can be found on my blog: http://vormplus.be/blog/article/autoloop-performer-synth [image] [image]

Read full topic
